mapper.select: SELECT device_number, MAX(measure_time) AS measure_time, MAX(acc_x_peak1) AS acc_x_peak1, MAX(acc_y_peak1) AS acc_y_peak1, MAX(acc_z_peak1) AS acc_z_peak1, CONCAT( CASE WHEN MAX(diff_x) > 0.1 OR MAX(diff_y) > 0.1 OR MAX(diff_z) > 0.1 THEN 'Danger' ELSE 'Safe' END ) AS alarm FROM ( SELECT device_number, measure_time, acc_x_peak1, acc_y_peak1, acc_z_peak1, ABS(acc_x_peak1 - LAG(acc_x_peak1) OVER (PARTITION BY device_number ORDER BY measure_time)) AS diff_x, ABS(acc_y_peak1 - LAG(acc_y_peak1) OVER (PARTITION BY device_number ORDER BY measure_time)) AS diff_y, ABS(acc_z_peak1 - LAG(acc_z_peak1) OVER (PARTITION BY device_number ORDER BY measure_time)) AS diff_z FROM rrps.mb_event ) AS subquery GROUP BY device_number ORDER BY device_number
